a.n: Benny Golson Quintet Feat Flavio Boltro

p.k: Creator of "Whisper Not", one of the most famous standards, Benny Golson has composed more than 300 pieces for the biggest names in jazz. With an unparalleled skill in musical phrasing, Benny Golson's performance is poetic and sincere.
p.d: Creator of "Whisper Not", one of the most famous standards, Benny Golson has composed more than 300 pieces for the biggest names in jazz. With an unparalleled skill in musical phrasing, Benny Golson's performance is poetic and sincere. During the Jazz en Baie festival project, Golson is accompanied by Antonio Farao, one of today's most prominent pianists, and Flavio Boltro, a talented trumpeter. We are treated to a performance of pure jazz combining technical perfection and positive energy.
